settings.label: Favicon
settings.info: Upload a 32x32 px PNG to use as your favicon.

settings.label: Enable custom logo
settings.info: Use a logo image on your site.

settings.label: Logo
settings.info: 440 x 200px .png (recommended). Note that your logo will display at 220 x 100px, but we recommend uploading an image twice as large as this for high-resolution displays.

settings.label: Enable mobile logo
settings.info: Using a smaller logo on smaller screens is helpful if your full logo is very large or has a lot of detail. A smaller logo could be an abbreviated or simpler version of your full logo.

settings.label: Logo - mobile
settings.info: 340 x 140px .png (recommended). Note that this smaller logo will display at 170 x 70px on smaller screens, but we recommend uploading an image twice as large as this for high-resolution displays.

settings.label: Newsletter prompt
settings.default: Sign up for our newsletter to be the first to know about new products, exclusive releases and promotions.

settings.label: Success Message
settings.info: If Mailchimp is enabled, this message will be ignored in favor of the response message from the Mailchimp servers.

settings.label: Error Message
settings.default: Whoops, something went wrong. If this issue persists, please contact us.

settings.label: Mailchimp form action URL
settings.info: For more info on where to find this, check out [this post](https://help.shopify.com/themes/customization/communication/get-a-mailchimp-form-action-url).
